name: Location, Location
description: Players must set up base in the given location

name: 404 Challenge
description: Once the sun sets on the first day, players must go underground and never return to the surface.

name: Nomadic
description: Players may not construct any long-term base and must continuously travel.

name: Not the Light!
description: Players must stay out of direct sunlight.

name: Tough as Nails
description: Players must stay at a comfortable temperature and stay hydrated.

name: Sussy Baka
description: A splinter cell of players are imposters that must try to prevent the main goal. The hard part is not getting caught!

name: Manhunt
description: A splinter cell of players actually tries to complete the mission while everybody else tries to stop them.

name: Bounties
description: Each player is assigned to kill another player.

name: All for One
description: If one player dies, all other players die simultaneously.

name: Feeling Inspired
description: Players must build something based on the given prompt.

name: Hoarder
description: Players must stockpile the given resource.
